mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT FROM ( SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE IN ('EI', 'IE', 'NS', 'SN', 'TF', 'FT', 'PJ', 'JP') ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NUM ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo}-1)*5 + 1 AND (#{pageNo})*5 ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NUM
